text: The 1905 California Golden Bears football team was an American football team that represented the University of California, Berkeley during the 1905 college football season. The team competed as an independent under head coach J. W. Knibbs and compiled a record of 4–1–2. This was Cal's last season of football until 1915, though rugby continued in this period. ==Schedule== ==References== California Category:California Golden Bears football seasons California Football
title: 1905 California Golden Bears football team
